request.description:
## Genre add

Endpoint for save an genre in the database.

## Movie add

Endpoint for save a movie in the database.

response.name: MOVIE ADD

request.description:
## Movie update

Endpoint for update a movie in the database.

## Movie delete

Endpoint for delete a movie in the database.

## Movie character add

Endpoint for add an character off a movie.

## Movie character remove

Endpoint for remove an character of a movie.

## All movies

Endpoint for get all movies from database.

## Movies by name

Endpoint for get all movies from database by name.

## Movies by genre

Endpoint for get all movies from database by genre.

## Movies by ascendant order

Endpoint for get all movies in ascendant order from database.

## Movies in descendent order

Endpoint for get all movies in descendent order from database.

## Movie by id

Endpoint for get a movie from database by id.

## Character add

Endpoint for save an character in the database.

## Character update

Endpoint for update an character in the database.

## Character delete

Endpoint for delete an character in the database.

## All characters

Endpoint for get all characters from database.

## Characters by name

Endpoint for get all characters from database by name.

## Characters by age

Endpoint for get all characters from database by age.

## Characters by movie

Endpoint for get all characters from database by movie id.

## Characters by Id

Endpoint for get all characters from database by id.

## Auth register

Endpoint for save an user in the database.

## Auth login

Endpoint for login user.
